name: Fling Rush
description:
The digital world behind you is collapsing! All you can do is to run...

Dive into a world of Art-Styles of Anime with Fling Rush. It is an endless runner game that you will enjoy! The game lets you play with 3 different characters and the options menu lets you to optimize the game according to your computer specifications!

The game is in beta version... with your help I can upgrade it into a ground breaker! So be kind enought to leave a comment on this page!

Use Alt+F4 to quit instantly if necessary!
